content: Hey y'all! I'm recovering from a stomach flu and likely won't make any meeting appearances today. I'm about to send out the agenda email for today's EWG, would one of you mind facilitating (and advocating for some of our OWG discussions that I'll make sure to drop into the agenda)?
I would prefer not to facilitate today because I have meetings all day from 9-4 and will likely be taking my lunch while attending the Pythia meeting.
:thumbs_up: Don't blame you there! I'll openly ask for a volunteer in the email out
Feel better soon @Drew Camron !! I am double booked during today's meeting... sorry!
